AltName.entry: SPRINGVALE AND AMOS TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION - FORMER NAME

Desc.entry: Represents tenants' interests in Springvale, Addy Street, Birkendale Road, Upperthorpe, Martin Street, Oxford Street, Shipton Street and Burlington Street.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues & Thurs 1.30-3pm (bingo, those wishing to access the TARA can speak to members during bingo group times); Monthly, usually 1st week in the month (Tenants' Association meeting)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 6
